resources.string:
Bill: Rp. %1$s
Your Expense: Rp. %2$s
Your Friend's Expense: Rp. %3$s
%4$s owes %5$s Rp. %6$s.

Bill: RP. %1$s
Expense: Rp. %2$s
Your Friend's Expense: Rp. %3$s
owes your Friend are even.

"Eat & Split" facilitates splitting costs when eating with friends. Users can input the bill, personal expenses, and friend\'s expenses, and the app will automatically calculate and display the results. Intuitive features help users divide costs fairly. Additionally, it can easily track transaction history.
Split A Bill With Your Friend
Name, Bill, and Expense can\'t be empty
Expense cannot be more than the bill value
Bill cannot be more than the bill value
